meanings.definition: The chief bishop of an Eastern Orthodox Church.
meanings.sent1: The catholicos led the church service on Sunday.
meanings.sent2: The catholicos is highly respected by the members of the church.
meanings.sent3: When the catholicos tripped over his robe, the congregation couldn't help but chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The catholicos stood tall like a beacon of faith in the community.
meanings.sent5: The ornate robes of the catholicos shimmered in the candlelight.

meanings.definition: A title for the head of an Eastern Christian church.
meanings.sent1: We are honored to have the catholicos visit our parish.
meanings.sent2: The catholicos presided over the important ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The children were excited to meet the catholicos and asked for his autograph.
meanings.sent4: The catholicos's wisdom shines through his teachings.
meanings.sent5: The bells tolled solemnly as the catholicos entered the church.
